title: Desk Cable Tidy Raceway
summary: Hide desk cords with an adhesive raceway and reusable ties for a clean workspace.

fitCheck.question: Are your cords hanging below the desktop?
Do you want the fix to be removable?
Do you have a smooth desk underside?

kit.name: Adhesive cable raceway
kit.why: Creates a tidy channel for cables.

kit.name: Mini power strip mount
kit.why: Lifts the power strip off the floor.

steps: Unplug devices and lay cords in the order you use them.
Mount the raceway under the desk following the cable path.
Bundle cords with reusable ties and feed them into the raceway.
Mount the power strip and keep a service loop near outlets.
mistakes: Mounting the raceway too close to the edge makes it visible.
Over-tightening ties can strain cable connectors.

faqs.a: Warm the adhesive with a hairdryer before removal to reduce residue.
